subject: Re: ClasspathSuite, JUnit 3.8 mixed with 4.5, big suites and memory leaks
msgSnippet: ... No, because we were not using ClasspathSuite at that time. Right now we are using the latest version (1.2.2 I believe) with a couple of patches (which,
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Johannes Link" <jl@...> wrote:
>
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "pgbossi" <pgbossi@> wrote:
> > Some days ago we noticed an increase in memory consumption,
> > noticeable on Hudson only. We thought that this was related more to
> > Clover than anything else.
>
> Have you by any chance upgraded ClasspathSuite at that time?

No, because we were not using ClasspathSuite at that time. Right now we are using the latest version (1.2.2 I believe) with a couple of patches (which, BTW, I plan to contribute back to you if you are interested).

Thanks,
Giuliano

--
Piergiuliano Bossi
